profile.longBusinessSummary: Netflix, Inc. provides entertainment services. It offers TV series, documentaries, feature films, and games across various genres and languages. The company also provides members the ability to receive streaming content through a host of internet-connected devices, including TVs, digital video players, TV set-top boxes, and mobile devices. It has operations in approximately 190 countries. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Los Gatos, California.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Jeffrey William Karbowski
companyOfficers.title: Chief Accounting Officer & Principal Accounting Officer

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Spencer  Wang
companyOfficers.title: Vice President of Finance, Corporate Development & Investor Relations
